content: do you guys think in the far future any erc20 token can have a larger marketcap than ethereum itself

content: If you take a look at BSC instead of ETH; SafeMoon absolutely skyrocketed the last month (not counting the last week). But even at their peak, they were tiny compared to the network they were on.
